Text:
Dude, when you create the torrent, select "add directory" in stead of "add file"

That way you can just have a single torrent, because nobody is going to download all of these (let alone seed them).

You should probably join the Forum (see the link in the footer of this page) to get some help.
@soda - It has been uploaded as one file here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7696659/BIBLIOTECA_CALIBRE_PAPYREFB2.rar, so maybe this one (and the other parts) can be removed.

fault was mine, inexperience, I humble apologies.
there is a torrent with the complete library,and I uploaded another divided in parts, in a single directory.for people with the pc in fat32.
all in individual parts must be erased.reitero my apologies

if you want to get rid of any torrent you need to ask it in the forums.
https://forum.suprbay.org/showthread.php?tid=125073
